extension.summary: VLC (Version: 3.0.16): is VideoLAN multimedia player and streamer
extension.description: VLC (Version: 3.0.16): is the VideoLAN project's media player. It plays MPEG, MPEG2, MPEG4, DivX, MOV, WMV, QuickTime, mp3, Ogg/Vorbis files, DVDs, VCDs, and multimedia streams from various network sources.
